Driving distance from SLC to West Yellowstone, MT. The total driving distance from SLC to West Yellowstone, MT is 324 miles or 521 kilometers. Your trip begins at Salt Lake City International Airport in Salt Lake City, Utah. It ends in West Yellowstone, Montana.

Driving distance from Salt Lake City, UT to Yellowstone National Park. The total driving distance from Salt Lake City, UT to Yellowstone National Park is 367 miles or 591 kilometers. Your trip begins in Salt Lake City, Utah. It ends in West Yellowstone, Wyoming.
